Package pl.lib.config

Class ReportConfig.Builder

java.lang.Object
pl.lib.config.ReportConfig.Builder
Enclosing class:
ReportConfig
public static class ReportConfig.Builder extends Object
Builder for ReportConfig class implementing Builder pattern.

Enables step-by-step building of ReportConfig object with optional fields.
